source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Ericaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: Modified from: Walsh, N.G. (1996). Ericaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Young stems invested with appressed or acutely inclined hairs; leaves elliptic, ovate to ovate-lanceolate, commonly 1.5 cm wide or more; eastern ranges
Young stems hispid with hairs spreading at near right-angles to surface; leaves lanceolate, rarely more than 1 cm wide; apparently Otway Range only
